channel.title: I got a serious problem with my server, please take some time and read it
channel.description:
OK, I just started coding, and my server got really good after a while ( ParScape v2 based ) Then, when i portforward, let people on, 50% said shops were leeched, so i was gonna change it. I went to shops.cfg, changed items and removed items, and i didnt remove [b]ANY[/b] spaces. I saved & compiled, runned server and now nobody can log on, including me plus it say this: [IMG]http://i489.photobucket.com/albums/rr260/O0000_o_o_o0/Pleasehelp.jpg[/img] So now I just started coding it all over again, lost like 5 pure hours of coding. :( :confused: :eek: :( :| :confused: :mad:
[font=Verdana]MANY THANKS TO WHOEVER HELP ME![/font]

item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

If I were you, I’d re-download the source and then replace your Shops.cfg you have now, with the one in the downloaded source. This will make you loose all your shop coding.

Read full topic

@o0000_o_o_o0 wrote:

OK, I just started coding, and my server got really good after a while ( ParScape v2 based )
Then, when i portforward, let people on, 50% said shops were leeched, so i was gonna change it.
I went to shops.cfg, changed items and removed items, and i didnt remove ANY spaces. I saved & compiled, runned server and now nobody can log on, including me plus it say this:
So now I just started coding it all over again, lost like 5 pure hours of coding. :eek: :mad:

[font=Verdana]MANY THANKS TO WHOEVER HELP ME![/font]
